name: synthwave-dark-vscode
description: A Dark Synthwave/Monokai inspired colour theme to satisfy your neon dreams
author: Sammy Kumar

commands.title: Synthwave Dark: Clean Up Workbench HTML

scripts.pretest: npm run clean-test && npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.feature:patch: npm run package && npm run version:patch && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin $(git branch --show-current) && gh pr create --base master --fill
scripts.feature:minor: npm run package && npm run version:minor && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin $(git branch --show-current) && gh pr create --base master --fill
scripts.feature:major: npm run package && npm run version:major && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin $(git branch --show-current) && gh pr create --base master --fill
scripts.release:tag: git tag v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') -m "Release v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')
